api parata godawena thaninma kumbauru yaya iwarawela rabarwaththa patan gannawa.ee rabar waththayi pare issarahatama kanda uda thiyena parana walawwayi dekamath senanayaka warunge pawulata ayithiyi.mata kalin kiyanna amathaka una api parata godauna thana ee kiyanne rabarwaththa kelaware purana sohon geyak thiyenawa.ee kiyanne walawwe maruna kipa denekuge bhashmawashesha hewath alu dapu kala kuda geyaka thiyala dora wahala thiyanawa.oya sohon geta nitharama akunu wadina nisa pare yaddi wassatawath waradilawath sohon geta godawenna epa kiyala ape thaththa kiyala thiyenawa kiyala amma apith ekka kiyanawa.ee nisa api ethanin yaddi ee paththawath balanne nathiwa wegen wegen ethanin piyaman karanawa.ee unata welyaye wadakarana goyiyo nan sohon geyi kota biththi uda indagena wita hapa hapa kayiya gahanawa api oona tharan dakala thiyenawa.oon dan api bothale pahalagama pahukarala ihalagamata langawuna.walbothale kiyalath thawa gamak thiyenawa.habayi ee gama bothaleta godak durayi.ithin bothale pihitima onna oya aakarayatayi.
